MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Hillhead Street and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am due to a safety issue near our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:23am on Friday, 16 October 2020
